messages.message: The copy shows the different type of documents accepted in the app. You must have created a doc type (class) called engineering, @Xi Cheng
Interesting - I just uploaded a resume of mine. Not sure what a doc type named "engineering" means?
Can you back to the project and confirm the class assigned to the resume in the project?
My hypothesis is that it was detected as ‘engineering’ somehow — we should improve classification, which is a separate issue :slightly_smiling_face:
Yes the class assigned is called "engineering"
@Xi Cheng we classified you right!! @Hari seems we need to fine tune the classification further.

@Hari would it be helpful to have more examples where classification got things wrong? an Investor Presentation was classified as ‘Overview’, and a press release as ‘Inclusivity’ based on what was announced in the press release.
@Josh Heidebrecht Definitely! Pls do share any example you encounter, we will use them for fine tuning the prompts.
